parameters.name: ConnectorIds
parameters.description: Collection of ConnectorIDs. Up to 100 ConnectorIDs can be entered.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number of the current page in a paginated query. Value: 1~10000.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Connector name. Length: 1~128 characters, supporting Chinese and uppercase/lowercase English letters, and can include numbers, periods (.), underscores (_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page in a paginated query. Value: 1~1000.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Connector connection status. Values:
- **Online**: Online.
- **Offline**: Offline.

parameters.name: SwitchStatus
parameters.description:
Connector instance status. Values:
- **Enabled**: Enabled.
- **Disabled**: Disabled.
